channel.title: Getting your server web compatible?
channel.description:
I've played these servers with web clients, hiscores and purchasing items and membership that appear in-game straight after payment.
Are there any tutorials on how to start developing all these features? I have web host, databases etc.. VB forums and everything I think I would need for it.

item.title: Getting your server web compatible?
item.dc:creator: @sgC sgC
item.description:
@sgC wrote:

No thanks, don’t advertise and I want tutorials or direction on how to get started on the things I stated above.

Read full topic
